topic: Exmatriculation from the B.Sc. Computer Science
question: I am enrolled in both the B.Sc. Computer Science and the B.Sc. Business Information Systems and will be exmatriculated from the B.Sc. Computer Science at the end of this semester. Do I have to exmatriculate myself or does it happen automatically? Will this affect my status in the B.Sc. Business Information Systems?"
answer: If you do not meet the criteria for the study progress control, you will automatically be exmatriculated from the study program without affecting other study programs.
